title: Did a teacher in Texas, Heather Holland, die because she couldn't get flu medication?
subtitle: The death of a 38-year-old girl from influenza complications became an Internet issue after it was reported that she could not afford life-saving drugs.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Heather Holland, a 38-year-old elementary school teacher in Willow Park, Texas, died because she couldn't afford to share the cost of flu medicine.
